# currency

**Instance Property**

The currency that the storefront uses.

## Declaration

```swift
@backDeployed(before: iOS 18.4, macOS 15.4, tvOS 18.4, watchOS 11.4, visionOS 2.4)
var currency: Locale.Currency? { get }
```
